about_me_text: I'm a developer based in Nice, specialising in Front-End development. I love making things.

experience_card.monist_desc: With Monist Studio, I worked with website design and developed performant and responsive websites for clients
experience_card.breachquest_desc: With Breachquest, I worked with a talented team of developers, working on Priori, a cutting edge cyber attack notification system
experience_card.BANGK_desc: With BANGK, I had the opportunity to create a variety of applications for a fintech platform, including a native application, a website and an internal dashboard

tech_stack_card.storybook: I use Storybook to test and develop components independent to the application, this ensures components are well built, with zero bugs
tech_stack_card.jest: Jest is my preferred testing method, it is fast and simple to use, with plenty of functionality built in
tech_stack_card.rtl: Along with Jest, React Testing Library ensures high coverage of my projects, from the smallest components to full features
tech_stack_card.figma: Along with Jest, React Testing Library ensures high coverage of my projects, from the smallest components to full features
tech_stack_card.github: I use GitHub for collaboration with developers in personal and professional environments
tech_stack_card.expo: Expo is good for mobile development
tech_stack_card.zod: Zod is my preferred type validation checker, ensuring secure type safety
